attributes.action: consider the public in the House of Commons Treasury select committee swap of £50 billion of government bonds for high street lenders' mortgages in a bid to ease the credit crunch. That the Treasury supports the economy and banking is great, but the petitioner is calling on the P.M. to reassure the electorate that home - owners, too, will also benefit fairly and equitably and the estimated one - third increase in repossessions is being suitably dealt with.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
